listData.name: Personal Loans
listData.description: Our personal loan can be used for renovating your home, booking your next holiday or upcoming wedding celebration. Maybe you’d like to piece together your finances, simplify your life and combine your debts with one regular repayment. Whatever the scenario, we can help make your dreams come true.

detailData.name: Personal Loans
detailData.description: Our personal loan can be used for renovating your home, booking your next holiday or upcoming wedding celebration. Maybe you’d like to piece together your finances, simplify your life and combine your debts with one regular repayment. Whatever the scenario, we can help make your dreams come true.

listData.name: Car & Motor Vehicle Loans
listData.description: Whether upgrading your vehicle, adventuring off-road in your four-wheel drive, or having fun on the water in your dream boat or jet ski, The Capricornian’s secured personal loan options could be your answer!

features.additionalInfo: Redraw of repaid principal above minimum required is available

eligibility.additionalInfo: You will need to become a member of the Credit Union before The Capricornian can accept a loan application.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.

fees.additionalInfo: Variations to Personal Loans (including substitution of goods mortgage security)

fees.additionalInfo: If you don’t make your payment after a period of time in arrears, you will be issued with a default notice.

fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments by the repayment due date.

fees.name: Arrears Fees - Reminder call fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments by the repayment due date.

applicabilityConditions.additionalInfo: Security must be brand new motor vehicle, motor bike, boat, jet ski, caravan and/or a motor home; registered with Personal Property Securities Register (PPSR).

Looking for a larger rural residential block?  Live your dream with our Lifestyle Home Loan, offering both fixed and variable rate options.

This loan is designed for Owner Occupiers or Investors looking to purchase a rural property up to 40 hectares.

fees.name: Fixed Rate Lock Fee - The Fee is 0.15% of the amount of credit or a minimum of $395.
fees.additionalInfo: Allows you to secure a guaranteed fixed interest rate to protect you against potential interest rate increases that may occur during the settlement period of your loan. The fee will guarantee the Interest rate up to 60 days from the date of the Offer and Loan Contract.

fees.name: Further Advance Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Includes one valuation up to the cost of $300 - Excludes additional valuation costs and solicitors costs to prepare mortgage documents and settlement fees.

fees.name: Fixed Rate Break Cost
fees.additionalInfo: You may have to pay this if you pay your loan off in full, make an early or extra repayment above $10,000 p.a, or make certain other changes to your loan, during any fixed-rate period.
